thread.section_title: The Milestone Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top Notch Experience!
thread.title_full: Top Notch Experience! - Review of The Milestone Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: laurynsnapp
title: Top Notch Experience!
text:
I recently stayed at the Miletone Hotel, and had an incredible experience! I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting London. The location was superb and I was consistently shocked by the level of service that I received from all of the members of your fabulous team. Their efforts to ensure that the welcome was always were warm, questions were quickly answered, and everything was handled at the highest level, was incredible and did not go unnoticed.
Checking in, Georgia was an incredible asset and very helpful to me while getting settled into the work week. Andrea was always warm welcome and had the best advice on some of Londonâ€™s must see places and restaurants!
Stay, relax, enjoy - the Milestone was certainly a phenomenal experience!
